query.statement:
SELECT CS126.CS126_GNO ,CS126.CS126_UPN ,CS126.CS126_CST ,CS126.CS126_PJT ,CS126.CS126_GND ,CS126.CS126_BSU ,CS126.CS126_HNO ,CS126.CS126_SEQ ,CS101.CS101_HNA ,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS126.MANDT,'CS119',CS126.CS126_GND) CS126_GND_NM ,CS126.CS126_ADT ,CS126.CS126_USD ,CS126.CS126_UGS ,CS126.CS126_UMR ,CS126.CS126_AMT ,CS126.CS126_AMBT ,VALUE(CS126.CS126_AMT,0) + VALUE(CS126.CS126_AMBT,0) AS CS126_AMTT ,CS126.CS126_HMT ,CS126.CS126_DMT ,CS126.CS126_KND ,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS126.MANDT,'CS129',CS126.CS126_GND) CS126_KND_NM ,ZMA02.ZSPEC2 ,ZMA02.ZSPEC12 ,CS121.CS121_NAM ,CS121.CS121_SPT ,CS630.CS630_TEM||'-'||CS630.CS630_RDT||'-'||CS630.CS630_SEQ CS630_SEQ ,ZW010.VKGRP ,CS630.CS630_GNO ,CS630.CS630_DOC ,CS630.CS630_PST ,CASE WHEN CS126.CS126_GNO = CS630.CS630_GNO THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UD_GUBUN ,ZAP01.APSTAT ,CDAP.DTEXT1 APSTAT_NM ,ZAP01.REDPT1 ,DECODE(CS126.CS126_BDGBN,'X','1','') AS BDGBN ,CS126.CS126_ACMT -- 공기청정기 추가 20200515 Han.JH FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT , CS126_HNO HNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_GNO = #GNO# AND CS126_UPN = #UPN# AND CS126_CST = #CST# AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6'
) X LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126 ON CS126.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126.CS126_PJT = PJT AND CS126.CS126_HNO = HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 CS101 ON CS126.MANDT = CS101.MANDT AND CS126.CS126_PJT = CS101.CS101_PJT AND CS126.CS126_HNO = CS101.CS101_HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 ZMA02 ON CS126.MANDT = ZMA02.MANDT AND CS126.CS126_PJT = ZMA02.POSID AND CS126.CS126_PJT||CS126.CS126_HNO = ZMA02.POSID_1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121 ON CS126.MANDT = CS121.MANDT AND CS126.CS126_UPN = CS121.CS121_UPN AND CS126.CS126_CST = CS121.CS121_CST
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST630 CS630 ON CS126.MANDT = CS630.MANDT AND CS126.CS126_UPN = CS630.CS630_UPN AND CS126.CS126_CST = CS630.CS630_CST AND CS126.CS126_GNO = CS630.CS630_GNO AND CS630.CS630_DEL = '' AND CS630.CS630_PST = 'A1'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 ZW010 ON CS126.MANDT = ZW010.MANDT AND CS126.CS126_BSU = ZW010.LGORT
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 ZAP01 ON CS126.MANDT = ZAP01.MANDT AND CS630.CS630_DOC = ZAP01.DOCNO AND ZAP01.DOCKIND = '6'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE CDAP ON CS630.MANDT = CDAP.MANDT AND CDAP.CODE1 = 'WBAP_STAT' AND CDAP.CODE2 = ZAP01.APSTAT AND CDAP.LANG = 'ko' WHERE CS126.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND CS126.CS126_GNO >= #GNO#
AND CS126.CS126_UPN = #UPN#
AND CS126.CS126_CST = #CST#
AND CS126.CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126.CS126_PST = 'A6' -- AND CS126.CS126_UMR > HEX(CURRENT DATE)
--ORDER BY CS126.CS126_GNO DESC, CS126.CS126_PJT, CS126.CS126_HNO ORDER BY CS126.CS126_GNO ASC, CS126.CS126_PJT, CS126.CS126_HNO WITH UR
